product_name: Nathan AP Pro Aerobar Hydration System
long_description: A hands-free hydration pod for racers and triathletes, the Nathan AP Pro Aerobar Hydration System features a flexible sipping straw to keep you hydrated while tucked in the aero position. Streamlined horizontal positioning reduces turbulence between your arms. Articulating arms stretch to fit any length or positioning of standard aero bars. Molded cage secures bottle while in use. Flexible straw allows for custom set-up and positioning; straw can be trimmed to suit your riding position. Soft-sip bite valve allows controlled access to fluids.
short_description: A hands-free hydration pod for racers and triathletes, the Nathan AP Pro Aerobar Hydration System features a flexible sipping straw to keep you hydrated while tucked in the aero position.
